page.title: 15TIME SPENT ON MEDIA
page.content: On behalf of the Association for Media Education in Scotland, Lasswade High School 3rd and 4th year Computing students processed a survey of 965 Scottish 1st, 2nd and 3rd pupils' {viewing, listening and reading habits. The survey included Lasswade High pupils.
